listeningQuestion.question: When will the Olympic Games be held in this country?
listeningQuestion.translation: 奥运会将在什么时候在这个国家举办？

editorNotes: 本课讲述了一个国家准备举办奥运会的故事。课文使用了将来完成时等时态，介绍了一些重要的语法点，如'look'的短语用法等。同时展示了举办大型体育赛事需要的各种准备工作。

dialogueText.heading: 课文
dialogue: The Olympic Games will be held in our country in four years' time.
As a great many people will be visiting the country, the government will be building new hotels, an immense stadium, and a new Olympic-standard swimming pool.
They will also be building new roads and a special railway line.
The Games will be held just outside the capital and the whole area will be called 'Olympic City'.
Workers will have completed the new roads by the end of this year.
By the end of next year, they will have finished work on the new stadium.
The fantastic modern buildings have been designed by Kurt Gunter.
Everybody will be watching anxiously as the new buildings go up.
We are all very excited and are looking forward to the Olympic Games because they have never been held before in this country.

translation.heading: 翻译
notes: 4年以后，奥林匹克运动会将在我们国家举行。
由于将有大批的人到我们国家来，所以政府准备建造一些新的饭店、一个大型体育场和一个新的奥运会标准游泳池。
他们还将修筑一些新的道路和一条铁路专线。
奥运会就在首都市郊举办，整个地区将被称作'奥林匹克城'。
工人们将在今年年底前把新路铺好。
到明年年底，他们将把新体育场建成。
这些巨大的现代化建筑是由库尔特·冈特设计的。
大家都将急切地注视着新建筑的建成。
我们都非常激动，盼望着奥运会的到来，因为在这个国家里还从未举办过奥运会。

newwords.heading: New words and expressions 生词和短语

notes.toggle: adj. 奥林匹斯山的，奥林匹亚的；奥林匹克的
vt. 持有；保存；拥有；拘留；约束或控制
adj. 巨大的，广大的；无边无际的； [ 口 ] 非常好的
n. 露天大型运动场；体育场
n. 标准；度量衡标准；旗；水准
n. 首都，省会；大写字母；资金；资本家
adj. 奇异的；极好的；空想的；不可思议的

notes.title: 将来完成时
content: will have + 过去分词，表示到将来某一时刻已经完成的动作
例句：Workers will have completed the new roads by the end of this year

notes.title: look的短语用法
content: look forward to: 期待（后接名词、代词或动名词）
例句：We are looking forward to the Olympic Games

notes.title: as的用法
content: 作为连词，可表示原因，通常位于句首
例句：As a great many people will be visiting the country...

notes.title: 时间表达
content: in four years' time: 四年之后
by the end of this year: 到今年年底前
例句：The Olympic Games will be held in our country in four years' time

notes.context: 表示对未来事件的期待
notes.example: We are looking forward to the Olympic Games.

notes.context: 表示在某个时间点之前
notes.example: Workers will have completed the new roads by the end of this year.
A great many people will be visiting the country.
Everybody will be watching anxiously as the new buildings go up.

notes.title: 词语辨析
notes.content: immense, fantastic, huge等都表示'巨大的'，但用法不同：immense强调无边无际；fantastic强调令人惊叹；huge强调体积庞大。

notes.title: 文化背景
notes.content: 奥运会是世界上最大的综合性运动会，举办国往往会投入大量资源进行基础设施建设，这不仅为赛事服务，也能促进举办城市的发展。
